summary: A cursed gunman (Snipes) whose victims come back from the dead recruits a young warrior to help in the fight against a gang of zombies.
cast: Wesley Snipes|Kevin Howarth|Riley Smith|Tanit Phoenix Copley|Simona Roman|Steven Elder|Patrick Bergin|Jay Grant|Hector Hugo|David De Beer|Alyssa Pridham|Dallas Page|Derek Griffiths|Alex Avant|Tommy Van der Nest|Jenny Gago|Arthur Berezin|Jack Bowyer|Pierre Roos|Martin Strauss|Joe Zmztsky
keywords: severed head|decapitation|deal with the devil|lever action rifle|prostitute
title: Cazador de demonios (Gallowwalkers)
